channel.title: Finance on Davi Simon's blog and site
channel.description: Recent content in Finance on Davi Simon's blog and site

item.title: My first post
item.description: First post First things first. Why having a website? I have a lot of code and ideas to share. Why now? Had to start it at some point. What will I blog about? Accounting, Corporate Finance, Governance (Public and Corporate), Pension Funds. R programming Language, Stata, Rmarkdown. Some others things will show up, I suppose. Will I update it frequently? Highly likely. How did I do it? https://bookdown.org/yihui/blogdown/ How long did it take?
